## [1.0.0] - 2025-11-24

### âœ¨ Added
- Initial menu system with Food, Drinks, and Daily Specials
- Basic menu structure for university cafeteria
- Student-friendly price listings for all items
- Java-based menu display system

### ğŸ½ï¸ Menu Categories
- **Breakfast items** (7:00 AM - 10:30 AM)
  - Quick grab-and-go options
  - Hot breakfast selections
- **Lunch options** (11:00 AM - 3:00 PM)
  - Daily rotating specials
  - Healthy and hearty choices
- **Beverages** (All day)
  - Coffee, tea, and cold drinks
  - Student discount on refills
- **Daily specials** (Changes daily)
  - Monday through Friday unique offerings
  - Weekend brunch specials

### ğŸ“ Development Notes
- Built with simple Java for educational purposes
- No external dependencies required
- Designed for Git workflow practice
- This file intentionally contains a conflict zone for learning

### ğŸ« About This Project
This cafeteria menu system was created as a teaching tool for Git version control. The simplicity of the code allows students to focus on Git workflows rather than programming complexity.

---

## Version Guidelines

When updating this changelog:
- Use semantic versioning (MAJOR.MINOR.PATCH)
- Keep entries organized by category
- Document all menu additions and removals
- Note any price changes

## Categories for Changes
- **Added** - New menu items or features
- **Changed** - Price updates or item modifications
- **Removed** - Discontinued items
- **Fixed** - Corrections to prices or descriptions
